pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Cud Chew causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon’s head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Armor Tail prevents the opponent from using any moves that have priority, such as Quick Attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Gluttony will use a pinch berry when its HP drops to 50%, rather than the usual 25%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents item theft.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sticky Hold prevents held items from being taken or switched.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents burns.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Corrosion allows the bearer to poison any Pokémon, including Steel and Poison types.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ignores any change in ability by the foe.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents attraction.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Oblivious makes the Pokémon immune to gender-based moves and abilities, specifically Attract, Captivate and Cute Charm.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents burns.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Storm Drain forces all single-target Water-type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. The ability is most useful in double/triple battles.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Promotes added effects.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Serene Grace doubles the chance of moves' secondary effects occurring - specifically stat changes, status ailments, or flinching. It also increases the chance of flinching due to the held items King's Rock and Razor Fang from 10% to 20% (however, note that those items do not affect moves that already have a flinch chance).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Makes escaping easier.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When a Pokémon with Rattled is hit by a Bug, Ghost or Dark type move, its Speed is raised one stage (up to the usual maximum of +6 stages).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Defiant raises the ability-bearer's Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises foe’s PP usage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Pressure makes any attack targeted at the ability-bearer - regardless of whether it hits - use 2 PP instead of 1.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Heat-and-cold protection.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire-type and Ice-type moves by 50%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. It also gives immunity to damage by hail (if they are not already protected by being Ice type).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents ability reduction.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Trades accuracy for power.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Makes escaping easier.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: May pick up items.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents confusion.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prankster increases the priority of status moves by +1.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Torrent increases the power of Water-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s using.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Protean changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prankster increases the priority of status moves by +1.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Not hit by GROUND attacks.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Levitate causes the Pokémon to be raised (like Flying-type Pokémon).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Trades accuracy for power.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Burns the foe on contact.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If a Pokémon with Flame Body is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become burned.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Trades accuracy for power.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Moves only every two turns.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Truant causes the ability-bearer to only attack every alternate turn. On the even turns, it will say the Pokémon is loafing around.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Trades accuracy for power.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Gluttony will use a pinch berry when its HP drops to 50%, rather than the usual 25%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up if hit by fire.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When a Pokémon with Flash Fire is hit by a Fire-type move, it does not deal damage but instead raises the power of the bearer's Fire-type moves by 50%. Subsequent hits do not raise the power even more, but the effect remains while the ability-bearer is in battle.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents ability reduction.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Avoids sound-based moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Soundproof grants the Pokémon immunity to all sound-based moves, preventing all damage and effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Paralyzes on contact.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If a Pokémon with Static is hit by a move making contact, there is a 30% chance the foe will become paralyzed.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents paralysis.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Hurts to touch.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When a Pokémon with Rough Skin is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacker receives damage equal to 1⁄8 of their maximum HP.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Big Pecks prevents the ability-bearer's Defense stat from being lowered, for example via Tail Whip.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When a Pokémon with Weak Armor is hit by a physical move, its Defense drops one stage, but its Speed increases by one stage.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If a Pokémon with Static is hit by a move making contact, there is a 30% chance the foe will become paralyzed.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1⁄3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Serene Grace doubles the chance of moves' secondary effects occurring - specifically stat changes, status ailments, or flinching. It also increases the chance of flinching due to the held items King's Rock and Razor Fang from 10% to 20% (however, note that those items do not affect moves that already have a flinch chance).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents loss of accuracy.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Keen Eye prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy, for example from moves like Sand-Attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Big Pecks prevents the ability-bearer's Defense stat from being lowered, for example via Tail Whip.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Hydration will cure itself of any status conditions during rain, at the end of each turn. This includes self-inflicted conditions such as from using Rest.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Ice Body will recover 1⁄16 of its maximum HP during hail, after each turn. It also grants immunity to the hailstorm damage, if not already immune.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. It also gives immunity to damage by hail (if they are not already protected by being Ice type).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When a Pokémon with Weak Armor is hit by a physical move, its Defense drops one stage, but its Speed increases by one stage.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When a Pokémon with the Illusion ability switches into battle, it takes the form of the Pokémon in last place (6th) of the player's party. Illusion will not activate if the Pokémon in last place is the same species or is fainted.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Infatuates on contact.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If a Pokémon with Cute Charm is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become infatuated. It will not infatuate Pokémon of the same gender, genderless Pokémon, nor those with the ability Oblivious.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Technician increases the power of moves - that are usually base power 60 or below - by 50%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Skill Link causes multi-strike moves to always hit their maximum number of times. The moves affected are listed below; note that moves such as Double Kick that always strike the same number of times are not affected.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up moves of the same type.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Adaptability increases the effectiveness of STAB moves from the usual 1.5× to 2×.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: May heal an ally’s status conditions.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: May heal an ally's status conditions.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1⁄3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Poisons foe on contact.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Swarm increases the power of Bug-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Gradually boosts SPEED.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Rush doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during a sandstorm.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises SPEED in rain.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Changes water into HP.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Water Absorb heals 1⁄4 of its maximum HP when hit by a Water-type attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ups ATTACK if suffering.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Guts raises the ability-bearer's Attack by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If burnt, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents flinching.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Inner Focus prevents the Pokémon from flinching, for example when attacked by a move like Headbutt.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Iron Fist increases the power of all punching moves by 20%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Summons a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Stream creates a sandstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Determines what moves a foe has.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Passes on status problems.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If the opponent causes a burn, paralysis, or poisoning of a Pokémon with Synchronize, the opponent receives the status condition too. Self-inflicted status conditions (for example through the use of an item) are not passed on.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Pokémon with the Telepathy ability will not take damage from teammates in double and triple battles.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If an attacker faints a Pokémon with Aftermath using a contact move, the attacker will lose 1⁄4 of their maximum HP.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents loss of accuracy.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Keen Eye prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy, for example from moves like Sand-Attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents sleep.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Insomnia prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep, both from moves by other Pokémon like Sing, and self-inflicted sleep like Rest.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Super Luck raises the ability-bearer's critical-hit ratio by one stage (for most moves this increases from a 1⁄16 chance to 1⁄8).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Moxie increases the user's Attack one stage upon fainting an opponent.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Heat-and-cold protection.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire-type and Ice-type moves by 50%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents confusion.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Defiant raises the ability-bearer's Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Makes escaping easier.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents paralysis.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Infatuates on contact.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If a Pokémon with Cute Charm is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become infatuated. It will not infatuate Pokémon of the same gender, genderless Pokémon, nor those with the ability Oblivious.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents paralysis.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: May pick up items.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Turns electricity into HP.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Volt Absorb heals 1⁄4 of its maximum HP when hit by an Electric-type attack, including Thunder Wave.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises SPEED in rain.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents burns.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up special attacks when burned.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Powers up special attacks when burned.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents item theft.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sticky Hold prevents held items from being taken or switched.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Storm Drain forces all single-target Water-type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. The ability is most useful in double/triple battles.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Honey Gather has no effect in battle.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Trades accuracy for power.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Storm Drain forces all single-target Water-type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. The ability is most useful in double/triple battles.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Technician increases the power of moves - that are usually base power 60 or below - by 50%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Skill Link causes multi-strike moves to always hit their maximum number of times. The moves affected are listed below; note that moves such as Double Kick that always strike the same number of times are not affected.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents paralysis.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents confusion.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents loss of accuracy.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Keen Eye prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy, for example from moves like Sand-Attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises foe’s PP usage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Pressure makes any attack targeted at the ability-bearer - regardless of whether it hits - use 2 PP instead of 1.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Avoids sound-based moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Soundproof grants the Pokémon immunity to all sound-based moves, preventing all damage and effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Avoids sound-based moves.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Soundproof grants the Pokémon immunity to all sound-based moves, preventing all damage and effects.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents status problems in sunny weather.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Leaf Guard prevents the bearer from succumbing to major status ailments (sleep, burns, poisoning, paralysis or freezing) during sunny weather.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises SPEED in sunshine.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Chlorophyll doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during bright sunshine.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. It also gives immunity to damage by hail (if they are not already protected by being Ice type).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: A Pokémon with Ice Body will recover 1⁄16 of its maximum HP during hail, after each turn. It also grants immunity to the hailstorm damage, if not already immune.

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Lowers the foe’s ATTACK.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Intimidate lower's the Attack of all opponents by one stage when the ability-bearer switches in (including the start of a battle).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ups ATTACK if suffering.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Guts raises the ability-bearer's Attack by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If burnt, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Attack.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Summons sunlight in battle.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Drought creates harsh sunlight when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Simple ability doubles the number of stages of all stat changes. Stats can be raised to a maximum of +6 stages each, or lowered to a minimum of -6 stages each.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Technician increases the power of moves - that are usually base power 60 or below - by 50%.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Prevents fleeing.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Arena Trap prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out. Raised Pokémon are not affected.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: May pick up items.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Infatuates on contact.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: If a Pokémon with Cute Charm is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become infatuated. It will not infatuate Pokémon of the same gender, genderless Pokémon, nor those with the ability Oblivious.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Competitive raises the ability-bearer's Special Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Powers up if hit by fire.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: When a Pokémon with Flash Fire is hit by a Fire-type move, it does not deal damage but instead raises the power of the bearer's Fire-type moves by 50%. Subsequent hits do not raise the power even more, but the effect remains while the ability-bearer is in battle.

pokemon_abilities.ability_desc: Summons sunlight in battle.
pokemon_abilities.ability_effect: Drought creates harsh sunlight when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.
